00043 // define targa private constants
00044 
00045 #define TGA_COLOR_MAP_NONE                          0
00046 
00047 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_NONE                         0
00048 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_CM                           1
00049 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_BGR                          2
00050 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_BW                           3
00051 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_RLE_CM                       9
00052 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_RLE_BGR                      10
00053 #define TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_RLE_BW                       11
00054 
00055 #define TGA_R                                       0
00056 #define TGA_G                                       1
00057 #define TGA_B                                       2
00058 #define TGA_A                                       3

00072 
00073 #define targaErrorf() \
00074     handleTargaError(fh, rc, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__)

00077 // define targa private functions

00079 static int handleTargaError(FILE *fh, int errorCode, const char *function,
00080         size_t line)
00081 {
00082     char *errorMessage = NULL;
00083 
00084     if((errorMessage = strerror(errno)) == NULL) {
00085         errorMessage = "uknown error";
00086     }
00087 
00088     fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error(%i) - #%i, '%s'.\n",
00089             (char *)function, (int)line, errorCode, (int)errno, errorMessage);
00090 
00091     if(fh != NULL) {
00092         fclose(fh);
00093     }
00094 
00095     return -1;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static int ctoi(char value)
00099 {
00100     return (int)((unsigned char)value);
00101 }
00102 
00103 static char *localStrndup(char *string, int length)
00104 {
00105     char *result = NULL;
00106 
00107     if((string == NULL) || (length < 1)) {
00108         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00109                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00110         return NULL;
00111     }
00112 
00113 #if defined(_GNU_SOURCE)
00114     result = strndup(string, length);
00115 #else // !_GNU_SOURCE
00116     result = (char *)malloc(sizeof(char) * (length + 1));
00117     memset(result, 0, (sizeof(char) * (length + 1)));
00118     memcpy(result, string, length);
00119 #endif // _GNU_SOURCE
00120 
00121     return result;
00122 }

00127 int targa_init(Targa *targa)
00128 {
00129     if(targa == NULL) {
00130         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00131                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00132         return -1;
00133     }
00134 
00135     memset((void *)targa, 0, sizeof(Targa));
00136 
00137     targa->width = 0;
00138     targa->height = 0;
00139     targa->imageLength = 0;
00140     targa->image = NULL;
00141 
00142     return 0;
00143 }
00144 
00145 int targa_free(Targa *targa)
00146 {
00147     if(targa == NULL) {
00148         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00149                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00150         return -1;
00151     }
00152 
00153     if(targa->image != NULL) {
00154         free(targa->image);
00155     }
00156 
00157     memset((void *)targa, 0, sizeof(Targa));
00158 
00159     return 0;
00160 }

00162 int targa_getDimensions(Targa *targa, int *width, int *height)
00163 {
00164     if((targa == NULL) || (width == NULL) || (height == NULL)) {
00165         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00166                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00167         return -1;
00168     }
00169 
00170     *width = targa->width;
00171     *height = targa->height;
00172 
00173     return 0;
00174 }

00189 int targa_getRgbaTexture(Targa *targa, char **texture, int *textureLength)
00190 {
00191     if((targa == NULL) || (texture == NULL) || (textureLength == NULL)) {
00192         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00193                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00194         return -1;
00195     }
00196 
00197     *texture = (char *)targa->image;
00198     *textureLength = targa->imageLength;
00199 
00200     return 0;

00202 
00203 int targa_loadFromFile(Targa *targa, char *filename)
00204 {
00205     int rc = 0;
00206     int fileLength = 0;
00207     unsigned char *buffer = NULL;
00208 
00209     FILE *fh = NULL;
00210 
00211     if((targa == NULL) || (filename == NULL)) {
00212         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00213                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00214         return -1;
00215     }
00216 
00217     if((fh = fopen(filename, "r+b")) == NULL) {
00218         return targaErrorf();
00219     }
00220 
00221     if((rc = fseek(fh, 0, SEEK_END)) != 0) {
00222         return targaErrorf();
00223     }
00224 
00225     if((fileLength = ftell(fh)) < 0) {
00226         return targaErrorf();
00227     }
00228 
00229     if((rc = fseek(fh, 0, SEEK_SET)) != 0) {
00230         return targaErrorf();
00231     }
00232 
00233     if(fileLength < 18) {
00234         fprintf(stderr, "error - TGA file '%s' length %i invalid.\n",
00235                 filename, fileLength);
00236         fclose(fh);
00237         return -1;
00238     }
00239 
00240     buffer = (unsigned char *)malloc(sizeof(unsigned char) * fileLength);
00241     memset(buffer, 0, (sizeof(unsigned char) * fileLength));
00242 
00243     rc = fread((char *)buffer, sizeof(char), fileLength, fh);
00244     if(rc != fileLength) {
00245         return targaErrorf();
00246     }
00247 
00248     fclose(fh);
00249 
00250     rc = targa_loadFromData(targa, buffer, fileLength);
00251 
00252     free(buffer);
00253 
00254     return rc;
00255 }
00256 
00257 int targa_loadFromData(Targa *targa, unsigned char *data, int dataLength)
00258 {
00259     short sNumber = 0;
00260     int ii = 0;
00261     int nn = 0;
00262     int imageIdLength = 0;
00263     int colorMap = 0;
00264     int imageType = 0;
00265     int bitLength = 0;
00266     int colorMode = 0;
00267     int length = 0;
00268     int rleId = 0;
00269     int pixel[4];
00270     unsigned char *imageId = NULL;
00271     unsigned char *ptr = NULL;
00272 
00273     if((targa == NULL) || (data == NULL) || (dataLength < 18)) {
00274         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00275                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00276         return -1;
00277     }
00278 
00279     ptr = data;
00280 
00281     // determine image ID length
00282 
00283     imageIdLength = (int)ptr[0];
00284     ptr++;
00285     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00286         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00287                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00288                 dataLength);
00289         return -1;
00290     }
00291 
00292     // check for color map
00293 
00294     colorMap = (int)ptr[0];
00295     ptr++;
00296     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00297         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00298                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00299                 dataLength);
00300         return -1;
00301     }
00302     if(colorMap != TGA_COLOR_MAP_NONE) {
00303         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - unable to read TARGA color map "
00304                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, colorMap);
00305         return -1;
00306     }
00307 
00308     // obtain image type
00309 
00310     imageType = (int)ptr[0];
00311     ptr++;
00312     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00313         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00314                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00315                 dataLength);
00316         return -1;
00317     }
00318     if((imageType == TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_NONE) ||
00319             (imageType == TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_CM) ||
00320             (imageType == TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_RLE_CM)) {
00321         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - unsupported image type %i.\n",
00322                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, imageType);
00323         return -1;
00324     }
00325 
00326     // skip 9 bytes (color-map information and x & y origins)
00327 
00328     ptr += 9;
00329     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00330         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00331                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00332                 dataLength);
00333         return -1;
00334     }
00335 
00336     // obtain image width
00337 
00338     memcpy((char *)&sNumber, ptr, sizeof(short));
00339     ptr += sizeof(short);
00340     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00341         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00342                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00343                 dataLength);
00344         return -1;
00345     }
00346     if(sNumber < 1) {
00347         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid image width %i.\n",
00348                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)sNumber);
00349         return -1;
00350     }
00351 
00352     targa->width = (int)sNumber;
00353 
00354     // obtain image height
00355 
00356     memcpy((char *)&sNumber, ptr, sizeof(short));
00357     ptr += sizeof(short);
00358     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00359         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00360                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00361                 dataLength);
00362         return -1;
00363     }
00364     if(sNumber < 1) {
00365         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid image height %i.\n",
00366                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)sNumber);
00367         return -1;
00368     }
00369 
00370     targa->height = (int)sNumber;
00371 
00372     // determine pixel depth
00373 
00374     bitLength = (int)ptr[0];
00375     ptr++;
00376     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00377         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00378                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00379                 dataLength);
00380         return -1;
00381     }
00382     if((bitLength != 16) && (bitLength != 24) && (bitLength != 32)) {
00383         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - unknown pixel depth of %i-bits.\n",
00384                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, bitLength);
00385         return -1;
00386     }
00387     if((bitLength == 16) &&
00388             ((imageType != TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_BGR) &&
00389              (imageType != TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_BW))) {
00390         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - unable to RLE-decode pixel depth "
00391                 "of %i-bits.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, bitLength);
00392         return -1;
00393     }
00394 
00395     // skip 1 byte (image descriptor)
00396 
00397     ptr++;
00398     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00399         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i vs "
00400                 "%i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00401                 dataLength);
00402         return -1;
00403     }
00404 
00405     // obtain the image ID
00406 
00407     if(imageIdLength > 0) {
00408         if(((int)(ptr - data) + imageIdLength) > dataLength) {
00409             fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun at %i "
00410                     "(image ID) by %i bytes.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__,
00411                     (int)(ptr - data),
00412                     (((int)(ptr - data) + imageIdLength) - dataLength));
00413             return -1;
00414         }
00415         imageId = (unsigned char *)localStrndup((char *)ptr, imageIdLength);
00416         ptr += imageIdLength;
00417         if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00418             fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with %i "
00419                     "vs %i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data),
00420                     dataLength);
00421             return -1;
00422         }
00423     }
00424 
00425     // process the image
00426 
00427     targa->imageLength = (long int)(targa->width * targa->height * 4);
00428     targa->image = (unsigned char *)malloc(sizeof(unsigned char) *
00429             targa->imageLength);
00430 
00431     if((imageType == TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_BGR) || (imageType == TGA_IMAGE_TYPE_BW)) {
00432         if(bitLength == 16) {
00433             colorMode = 2;
00434         }
00435         else {
00436             colorMode = (bitLength / 8);
00437         }
00438         length = (targa->width * targa->height * colorMode);
00439         if(((int)(ptr - data) + length) > dataLength) {
00440             fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun at %i "
00441                     "(image pixels) by %i bytes.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__,
00442                     (int)(ptr - data),
00443                     (((int)(ptr - data) + length) - dataLength));
00444             return -1;
00445         }
00446         for(ii = 0, nn = 0; ((ii < length) && (nn < targa->imageLength));
00447                 ii += colorMode, nn += 4) {
00448             if(colorMode == 2) {
00449                 memcpy((char *)&sNumber, ptr, sizeof(short));
00450                 pixel[TGA_R] = ctoi((sNumber & 0x1f) << 3);
00451                 pixel[TGA_G] = ctoi(((sNumber >> 5) & 0x1f) << 3);
00452                 pixel[TGA_B] = ctoi(((sNumber >> 10) & 0x1f) << 3);
00453                 pixel[TGA_A] = 255;
00454             }
00455             else {
00456                 pixel[TGA_R] = ctoi(ptr[2]);
00457                 pixel[TGA_G] = ctoi(ptr[1]);
00458                 pixel[TGA_B] = ctoi(ptr[0]);
00459                 if(colorMode == 3) {
00460                     pixel[TGA_A] = 255;
00461                 }
00462                 else {
00463                     pixel[TGA_A] = ctoi(ptr[3]);
00464                 }
00465             }
00466 
00467             targa->image[(nn + 0)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_R];
00468             targa->image[(nn + 1)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_G];
00469             targa->image[(nn + 2)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_B];
00470             targa->image[(nn + 3)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_A];
00471 
00472             ptr += colorMode;
00473         }
00474     }
00475     else { // RLE image
00476         ii = 0;
00477         nn = 0;
00478         rleId = 0;
00479         colorMode = (bitLength / 8);
00480         length = (targa->width * targa->height);
00481         while(ii < length) {
00482             rleId = (int)ptr[0];
00483             ptr++;
00484             if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00485                 fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun with "
00486                         "%i vs %i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__,
00487                         (int)(ptr - data), dataLength);
00488                 return -1;
00489             }
00490 
00491             if(rleId < 128) {
00492                 rleId++;
00493                 while(rleId > 0) {
00494                     pixel[TGA_R] = ctoi(ptr[2]);
00495                     pixel[TGA_G] = ctoi(ptr[1]);
00496                     pixel[TGA_B] = ctoi(ptr[0]);
00497                     if(colorMode == 3) {
00498                         pixel[TGA_A] = 255;
00499                     }
00500                     else {
00501                         pixel[TGA_A] = ctoi(ptr[3]);
00502                     }
00503 
00504                     targa->image[(nn + 0)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_R];
00505                     targa->image[(nn + 1)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_G];
00506                     targa->image[(nn + 2)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_B];
00507                     targa->image[(nn + 3)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_A];
00508 
00509                     rleId--;
00510                     ii++;
00511                     nn += 4;
00512                     if(nn >= targa->imageLength) {
00513                         break;
00514                     }
00515                     ptr += colorMode;
00516                     if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00517                         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data "
00518                                 "overrun with %i vs %i.\n", __FUNCTION__,
00519                                 __LINE__, (int)(ptr - data), dataLength);
00520                         return -1;
00521                     }
00522                 }
00523             }
00524             else {
00525                 pixel[TGA_R] = ctoi(ptr[2]);
00526                 pixel[TGA_G] = ctoi(ptr[1]);
00527                 pixel[TGA_B] = ctoi(ptr[0]);
00528                 if(colorMode == 3) {
00529                     pixel[TGA_A] = 255;
00530                 }
00531                 else {
00532                     pixel[TGA_A] = ctoi(ptr[3]);
00533                 }
00534                 ptr += colorMode;
00535                 if((int)(ptr - data) > dataLength) {
00536                     fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - detected data overrun "
00537                             "with %i vs %i.\n", __FUNCTION__, __LINE__,
00538                             (int)(ptr - data), dataLength);
00539                     return -1;
00540                 }
00541 
00542                 rleId -= 127;
00543                 while(rleId > 0) {
00544                     targa->image[(nn + 0)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_R];
00545                     targa->image[(nn + 1)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_G];
00546                     targa->image[(nn + 2)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_B];
00547                     targa->image[(nn + 3)] = (unsigned char)pixel[TGA_A];
00548 
00549                     rleId--;
00550                     ii++;
00551                     nn += 4;
00552                     if(nn >= targa->imageLength) {
00553                         break;
00554                     }
00555                 }
00556             }
00557             if(nn >= targa->imageLength) {
00558                 break;
00559             }
00560         }
00561     }
00562 
00563     if(imageId != NULL) {
00564         free(imageId);
00565     }
00566 
00567     return 0;
00568 }
00569 
00570 int targa_applyRgbaMask(Targa *targa, int colorType, unsigned char value)
00571 {
00572     int ii = 0;
00573     int startPosition = 0;
00574 
00575     if((targa == NULL) ||
00576             ((colorType != TARGA_COLOR_RED) &&
00577              (colorType != TARGA_COLOR_GREEN) &&
00578              (colorType != TARGA_COLOR_BLUE) &&
00579              (colorType != TARGA_COLOR_ALPHA))) {
00580         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00581                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00582         return -1;
00583     }
00584 
00585     switch(colorType) {
00586         case TARGA_COLOR_RED:
00587             startPosition = 0;
00588             break;
00589         case TARGA_COLOR_GREEN:
00590             startPosition = 1;
00591             break;
00592         case TARGA_COLOR_BLUE:
00593             startPosition = 2;
00594             break;
00595         case TARGA_COLOR_ALPHA:
00596             startPosition = 3;
00597             break;
00598     }
00599 
00600     for(ii = startPosition; ii < targa->imageLength; ii += 4) {
00601         targa->image[ii] += value;
00602     }
00603 
00604     return 0;
00605 }
00606 
00607 int targa_setRgbaChannel(Targa *targa, int colorType, unsigned char value)
00608 {
00609     int ii = 0;
00610     int startPosition = 0;
00611 
00612     if((targa == NULL) ||
00613             ((colorType != TARGA_COLOR_RED) &&
00614              (colorType != TARGA_COLOR_GREEN) &&
00615              (colorType != TARGA_COLOR_BLUE) &&
00616              (colorType != TARGA_COLOR_ALPHA))) {
00617         fprintf(stderr, "[%s():%i] error - invalid or missing argument(s).\n",
00618                 __FUNCTION__, __LINE__);
00619         return -1;
00620     }
00621 
00622     switch(colorType) {
00623         case TARGA_COLOR_RED:
00624             startPosition = 0;
00625             break;
00626         case TARGA_COLOR_GREEN:
00627             startPosition = 1;
00628             break;
00629         case TARGA_COLOR_BLUE:
00630             startPosition = 2;
00631             break;
00632         case TARGA_COLOR_ALPHA:
00633             startPosition = 3;
00634             break;
00635     }
00636 
00637     for(ii = startPosition; ii < targa->imageLength; ii += 4) {
00638         targa->image[ii] = value;
00639     }
00640 
00641     return 0;
00642 }
